languages.text:
On 50% or less Wounds wielder gains {uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} Dodge and Melee Critical Hit Chance
Base Armour Property: Dodge +10% if wearers AGI more than 50

traits.locale_text:
On 50% or less Wounds wielder gains {uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} Dodge and Melee Critical Hit Chance
Base Armour Property: Dodge +10% if wearers AGI more than 50

languages.text: While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 50.
languages.original_text: Пока у персонажа меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличены на {uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Базовое свойство: +10% к уклонению, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} больше 50.

traits.locale_text: While the wielder has less than 50% wounds, their dodge and melee critical hit chance are increased by +(2 × AGI bonus)%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wielder's Agility is more than 50.

While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's Agility is more than 50.

While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's Agility is more than 50.

While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's Agility is more than 50.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'nin altındaysa {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} değerleri +%{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} artar. Taban zırh özelliği: Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği 50'den yüksekse +%10 kaçınma.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'nin altındaysa {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} değerleri +%{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} artar. Taban zırh özelliği: Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği 50'den yüksekse +%10 kaçınma.

Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g} %50'nin altındaysa {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} değerleri +%{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} artar. Taban zırh özelliği: Kullanan kişinin Çeviklik niteliği 50'den yüksekse +%10 kaçınma.

languages.text: Mientras el portador tenga menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, tanto su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} como su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumentan en un +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} %. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de esquiva si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del portador es superior a 50.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el portador tenga menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, tanto su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} como su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumentan en un +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} %. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de esquiva si la Agilidad del portador es superior a 50.

Mientras el portador tenga menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, tanto su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} como su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumentan en un +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} %. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de esquiva si la Agilidad del portador es superior a 50.

languages.text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}高于50，获得+10%闪避。
languages.original_text: While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的敏捷高于50，获得+10%闪避。

当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的敏捷高于50，获得+10%闪避。

languages.text: Tant que les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur sont inférieures à 50 %, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} augmentent de +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} %. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'Esquive si l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 50.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 50.

Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +10 % à l'esquive si l'Agilité de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 50.

Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'Esquive si l'Agilité de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 50.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%未満の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}が+{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%増加する。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}が50を超える場合、回避+10%。
languages.original_text: While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の傷が50%未満の場合、回避と近接クリティカル率が+{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%増加する。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の敏捷性が50を超える場合、回避+10%。

使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%未満の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}が+{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%増加する。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の敏捷性が50を超える場合、回避+10%。

使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%未満の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}が+{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%増加する。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の敏捷性が50を超える場合、回避+10%。

languages.text: Hat der Träger weniger als 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, erhöht sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} im {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g} um +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3} %. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % Ausweichen, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Trägers höher als 50 ist.
